title: Rifle Is Beautiful (Chidori RSC)
synopsis: Rifle-shooting sports are competitive activities testing accuracy and precision using a rifle. In Japan, carrying firearms is prohibited, so most of the participants are members of the defense force. When the use of rifles using a light beam instead of real bullets as ammunition became common, rifle-shooting competitions became accessible to the younger population, giving way to school contests.
characters: ['Igarashi, Yukio', 'Kokura, Hikari', 'Meinohama, Erika', 'Shibusawa, Izumi', 'Mochizuki, Ryoko', 'Sakashita, Karen', 'Shinonome, Akira', 'Tsurumaki, Yuuko', 'Kuroi, Misa']
